TopicTitle: UKSBA; United Kerbal Space Battle Association

Articles.Content:
Here, I will be posting all of the ships used in the UKSBA fleet of mine, used in large scale battles throughout the RWSaCP organization. Consists of five categories;

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Battle platform [A large stationary platform, in UKSBA controlled space as a command post, capable of docking frigates, has large missiles]

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Carrier [used as fighter transports and flag ships]

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Frigate [used as smaller carriers, have on ship weapons, but carry few fighters]

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Spear-head fighters [used as battering rams]

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Heavy fighters [used as defense, or frontline, for large scale invasions

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Light fighters [used as a light fighter, not very effective against Carriers or Frigates.]

P.S. I hope to aid Macey Dean in his videos!

I AM NOT DONE! I AM UPDATING ALL POSTS

Edited July 29, 2013 by Redwork Studios|Redwork1
